summary: WHEN MAKING SLIGHT LEFT TURNS, THE TRUCK WOULD FLASH STABILITRAK ON THE DISPLAY AND THE STEERING WHEEL WOULD AUTOMATICALLY PULL OUT OF MY HANDS AND MAKE THE WHEELS STRAIGHTEN UP. THE RADIO WOULD THEN GO DEAD AND THEN 5 TO 10 SECONDS LATER THE ENTIRE TRUCK WOULD TURN OFF. THIS HAPPENED WHILE DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD. THIS HAPPENED ON 2 SEPARATE OCCASIONS WITH NO OTHER WARNINGS. I CONTACTED GMC AND THEY HAVE NOT GIVEN ME ANY TYPE OF ANSWER OR ASSISTANCE.
